LanguageData.CaveCalm.label: calm
LanguageData.CaveCalm.description: A calm cave moment. No penalties or modifiers.
LanguageData.CaveFog.label: fog
LanguageData.CaveFog.description: Fog reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons as if darkness was not enough... Global humidity level is surprisingly high in caves.
LanguageData.CaveStorm.label: cave storm
LanguageData.CaveStorm.description: Cave storm happen when large surface tempest occur. The powerful winds will slow down people a lot.
LanguageData.CaveHardSnow.label: hard snow
LanguageData.CaveHardSnow.description: Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.
